title: gitlab ci: dynamic environments
description: spin up per-branch environments with review apps and teardown.
context: prefer ephemeral envs with cost controls and auto-teardown.
instructions: 1) define jobs and environment names. 2) add review apps with urls. 3) implement teardown on branch deletion. 4) output .gitlab-ci.yml snippet.
model_tips: use rules/if for branches and mrs.
